Sociologist, working at the University of Lodz and Polish Academy of Science. My Ph.D. thesis is devoted to the social world of data science in Poland. I am a research team member at the Cross National Biographies project (CNB-Young), where we harmonize panel survey data regarding precarity in UK, USA, Germany, and Poland. Open source and open science enthusiast.
